alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Park County; Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 2:22PM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...North Park, Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet, and South Park. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Chain and traction laws will possibly be enacted for the mountains. If traveling to the mountains, be prepared for winter driving conditions. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Park County; Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
